attributes.action: Repeal the 1972 Communities Act and withdraw from the European Union.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will bring back British Government for British people, save us billions of pounds in undemocratic EU taxes and pave the way for the removal of thousands of EU diktats which are crippling British businesses.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
